settings.review_message: “This product is fantastic. Have seen drastic improvements in my skin. Dark spots are diminishing every day. Serum is easy to apply and smells great.”

settings.title: FIÈRA CITRUS STEM CELL SERUM BENEFITS
settings.title_1: Fades the appearance of dark spots for an even skin tone
settings.content_1: As skin ages, it produces more pigment-containing cells, called melanin, than typical. That, combined with the effects of sun and other free radicals on the skin, contribute to dark spots, wrinkles, lines and general dullness. Using a powerful combination of natural ingredients to repair and rejuvenate the skin, our formula visibly fades dark spots and restores a youthful, vibrant glow.
settings.title_2: Slows melanin production and protects skin from further damage
settings.content_2: Repairing skin is only half the battle. It’s just as important to protect against future damage and signs of aging. By slowing melanin production, we can prevent the build up of hyperpigmentation for a more even skin tone with age. Powerful antioxidants also protect against damage from UV rays and other environmental factors, preserving a more youthful appearance.
settings.content_3: When collagen and connective tissues degenerate, skin is slacker and hangs more loosely. Stimulating these levels gives skin its “bounce” back to look and feel tighter. Our exclusive formula supports and protects collagen and elastin production, working to firm up sagging skin on the face and jowls for the appearance of a more lifted, sculpted face and jawline.
settings.title_4: Visibly Smooths Fine Lines and Wrinkles
settings.content_4: Fièra Citrus Stem Cell Serum restores the skin with water-binding molecules for complete rehydration, reducing the depth of fine lines and wrinkles and therefore their appearance. Dehydrated skin isn’t just dry, wrinkly, and dull - it’s also less resilient to environmental toxins. By hydrating with high-quality ingredients, skin gets the nourishment to revitalize and protect itself better.

settings.tab_info:
Vitamin C

Vitamin C is a vital nutrient everyone needs... but not everyone knows the incredible impact it can have for brighter, younger-looking skin.

As an antioxidant, vitamin C is one of the best topical applications to protect against sun damage or other environmental factors. High UV exposure can lower natural levels of vitamin C in the skin and leave it vulnerable to damage.

Vitamin C helps to repair skin by slowing melanin production and stopping the hyperpigmentation behind dark spots and patches. This means it not only fades those spots, but encourages a more even complexion.

Vitamin C is one of the key ingredients in Fièra Citrus Stem Cell Serum that both shields and revitalizes for vibrant, radiant skin.

  • Proven to fade dark spots and brighten skin (when properly concentrated and formulated)
  • Protects the skin from UV and environmental damage
  • Slows melanin product to maintain an even skin tone

Sodium Hyaluronate

Hyaluronic Acid is becoming a popular addition to serums. However, a hyaluronic acid molecule is too large to penetrate the skin and improve hydration BELOW the surface. That’s where sodium hyaluronate - a salt extracted from hyaluronic acid - comes into play. The molecule is small enough to sink into the skin to nourish and hydrate the deeper layers, which can be just as dehydrated.

When applied, sodium hyaluronate drags moisture into skin cells to quench dryness and increase hydration. Wrinkles and lines fade as skin regains its smoothness. A 2014 study found that sodium hyaluronate could not only shrink wrinkle depth and volume, but improve elasticity-with researchers linking the effect to this powerful humectant.

That’s why Fièra Citrus Stem Cell Serum contains high-quality sodium hyaluronate: to absorb deep into the skin’s layers, hydrate cells, and undo dehydration for smoother, tighter skin.

  • Maintains, supports and promotes collagen and elastin production
  • Binds water back into the skin
  • Combined with Vitamin C, has an exponential effect on skin’s rejuvenation

Citrus Stem Cells

Recent scientific advances have allowed plants to be used in skin care in exciting new ways. One breakthrough has been harvesting plant-based stem cells that contain powerful skin-loving components like proteins and amino acids.

Citrus stem cells have been shown to give skin renewed elasticity and tightness by stimulating collagen production. One group of women discovered their skin elasticity improved by 17.5% after applying a topical containing citrus stem cells for just eight weeks.

Plus, citrus stem cells are a rich source of antioxidants that help clean out damaging free radicals and keep the skin free of toxins.

The Fièra Citrus Stem Cell Serum combines a citrus stem cell extract with the other ingredients to complete this 3-step process to stop premature aging and give your skin a younger, firmer-looking appearance.

  • Encourages the production of collagen for firmer, tighter skin
  • Stimulates skin regeneration to fade the appearance of dark spots
  • Antioxidant activity prevents or slows free radical damage to skin cells

Natural Support Ingredients

  • Caribbean Orange Oil

    This light, fragrant oil is derived from fresh orange peel and acts as a natural moisturizer and conditioner that nourishes skin. It’s also been shown to brighten skin tone and contains vitamin C to further boost the rejuvenating properties of the serum.

  • Glycerin

    Another water-loving humectant, glycerin is a perfect addition. While sodium hyaluronate soaks deep to renew the inner layers of the skin, glycerin hydrates the outer layers. Acting as an emollient, it also leaves skin soft to the touch.

  • Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract

    As well as being an anti-inflammatory, chamomilla recutita (otherwise known as “German chamomile”) is known to reduce skin damage and aging from UV exposure.

settings.title: Key Ingredients
settings.ingredient_list_content: Water, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Saccharide Isomerate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Callus Culture Extract, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Carrageenan, Sclerotium Gum, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 20, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Polyacrylate, Iron Oxide (CI77492), Iron Oxide (CI77491).Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).

settings.title: FAQs
settings.html:
Where Are Fièra Products Made?

Our products are all proudly formulated and produced in the USA. Depending on if you order our concealer or some of our other facial care products, they were manufactured in either New York or Florida.

What Is Your Return Policy?

We have a 30-day full money back return policy. Simply mail the products to either address:

1) USA: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 3335, Buffalo, NY, 14240-3335
2) Canada: Fiera Cosmetics PO Box 1212 Willowdale, ON, M3J 0L3

When returning any products please ensure to include your full name, and order number on the outside of the package. Your order number can be found on the packing slip or on the order confirmation email we sent to you. Please ensure the information provided is the same credentials that were used when placing your order. This allows us to associate the returned product with the appropriate account.

As soon as we receive the return, we will process the refund right away. All refunds will go back to the original form of payment. Once the refund is processed, some banks can take up to 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect on your credit card statement.

Customers are responsible for the cost of return shipping.

Can I Purchase Fièra Products In Retail Stores?

We made the decision to not put our products in retail outlets and instead sell only to our customers directly online. Retail stores take very large margins and charge a premium for the top shelf space. Consumers get promoted products that paid the most money to be there versus being promoted the products that deliver the best results. We let our customer reviews do our selling for us and instead of buying shelf space, we take a portion of every sale donate it to help feed people in need through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest.

Where do your products ship from?

We ship to our US customers daily from Buffalo, NY and to our Canadian customers daily from Toronto, ON.

When is my order arriving?

All of our customer shipments are fully tracked. On the next business day following your purchase, you should have received an email from us containing your tracking information. If you don’t see this in your inbox, make sure to check your spam folder.

What concealer shade should I order?

The color you choose depends on what you'll be primarily using it for. If it's especially for under eye coverage, we recommend going a shade lighter than you'd normally choose. If it's for other full facial coverage, we recommend choosing a shade closer to what you would use for foundation. We have customers who will buy two shades so they can go lighter and darker as they need to and use the two colors to blend.
Here’s a video that should help you choose the perfectly color for you.

How do you apply the concealer?

How you apply the concealer comes down to personal preference. The concealer itself is quite thick in order to provide maximum coverage so it’s best to let it warm up a little before spreading either on the back of your hand or between your fingers.

Once warmed, most of our customers chose to use their fingers to dab it onto their skin, and then use the brush, their fingers, or a sponge to blend it.

What are the ingredients in your products:

Concealer Ingredients
Neck Cream Ingredients
Finishing Powder Ingredients
Apple Stem Cell Cream Ingredients
Citrus Stem C Serum Ingredients

What is the undertone of each concealer shade?

Light - fair cool
Neutral beige - neutral
Medium - warm
Deep - warm
Dark - cool

How long does a tube of concealer last?

It depends on the individual, as some of our customers will use it primarily as a concealer, while others use it as foundation. Our product is formulated to be quite concentrated and therefore a little goes a long way!

Do you give samples?

Unfortunately, due to the high cost of shipping and packing, we do not have samples but we do however offer a full 30 day money back guarantee. If for whatever reason you aren't satisfied you can return any of our products for a full refund

Will your products clog my pores and make me break out?

Our products are noncomedogenic and have high quality ingredients like hyaluronic acid which is light, hydrates skin and doesn't clog pores, making it much less likely that you'll breakout.

What if I order the wrong shade of concealer?

If you are unsatisfied for any reason you can return your concealer for a full refund. Please refer to our Return Policy.

Does your concealer conceal scars, brown spots, age spots, under eye bags, sun damage etc…?

Our concealer is specifically formulated for mature skin to provide excellent coverage for various signs of aging and skin imperfections.

How long does it take to ship?

In the US we use USPS First Class Mail and in Canada we use Canada Post for all our orders. We ship our orders next business day and barring any carrier delays most orders arrive within 2-4 business days.

Do you test on animals?

Absolutely not! None of our products are ever tested on animals.

Does the concealer work for rosacea?

We’ve had a lot of positive feedback from customers using our concealer who have rosacea.

How long does the concealer last?

Our concealer has been specifically formulated for all day wear.

Will the concealer work for sensitive, oily and dry skin types?

Our concealer has been formulated to work with all skin types

How do I change or cancel my subscription?

Should you wish to change or cancel your subscription, you can do so by emailing support@fieracosmetics.com or by calling customer service at 1-833-693-4372. We will be happy to assist you with whatever you need. You can reach us Monday to Friday between the hours of 8 am - 8pm, or Saturday from 9 am - 5pm, Eastern Standard Time.

How and when will I be charged for my subscription?

The credit card you used for your first subscription order will be automatically charged at the time of shipping, and at the time of shipping for every future order, depending on your selected subscription. You will never be charged shipping for any subscription orders. The charge will appear on your billing statement as Fièra Cosmetics.
